system.description:
Beginning at 10th level, you gain the following benefits:

  • You add Animate Dead to your spellbook if you don’t already have it. It is always considered to be prepared, and does not count against your limit of prepared spells.

  • Once per long rest you can use Animate Dead to target 5 or more piles of bones or corpses of a size no larger than medium.

  • When casting Animate Dead, instead of creating multiple skeletons or zombies, you may instead create a Skeleton Horde or Zombie Horde, provided you are targeting at least 5 corpses or piles of bones.

  • You need only expend one use of Animate Dead to maintain control over a Skeleton Horde or Zombie Horde.

  • Whenever you use a bonus action to command an undead under your control, if that creature was created through the spell Animate Dead, you may choose to issue a command to each undead animated through the spell, and each of them may be issued with a different task.

  • Any Hordes you control share the same initiative.
